page.title: 18Clubs - Winchfield Area
page.content: The Hart Leisure Centre is the venue for a number of{sports clubs}&{keep- {fit groups. Fleet Youth Activities {Group}meets at the Centre &{Hitches {Lane Community Playgroup}is also held there each morning during term time. There is the{'Orwell-Davies School of {Dancing'}which operates in Winchfield Village Hall & the{Hartley Arts Group also meets there & produces plays for local people. Then there is the{Hort- {icultural Society}which has its annual flower & vegetable show. The{mobile {library}makes two stops in the block once a fortnight.The Church has many activities & a thriving{Sunday-school which meets during the family service every Sunday afternoon in Winchfield Church. The Harvest Festival every other year is a great occasion.{Cubs, {Brownies, Scouts & Guides}meet in Fleet, Odiham or Hartley Wintney.
